leukapp.apps.core.constants module¶

This module contains the core app constants. Information that isn’t likely to change and that is used across the core app and the leukapp project should be stored here.

Important

DO NOT change any constant unless you know what you are doing.

APP_NAME = 'core'¶

Application’s name.

UNKNOWN = 'UNKNOWN'¶

Value used accross the leukapp project to describe unknown information.

DEFAULT = 'DEFAULT'¶

Value used accross the leukapp project to describe a default value.

SUCCESS_MESSAGE = 'Looking good'¶

Success message used across the apps package.

PERMISSION_DENIED_MESSAGE = " You don't have permission to perform this action, please contact a\n Leukgen Administrator. "¶

Permission denied message used across the apps package.
